query: SHOW COLUMNS FROM membership_plans WHERE Field LIKE '%billing%';

stdout:

billingFrequency	enum('monthly','weekly','daily','drop_in')	NO		monthly	
billingInterval	int(11)	YES		1	
billingCycle	enum('monthly','biweekly','weekly','annual')	NO		monthly
